column1: Peredhil (sing. Peredhel) was a name for the "Half-elven" in Sindarin.: "Half-elven Translation of Sindarin Peredhel
column2: plural Peredhil": "edhel elf (Sindarin) in ... Peredhil Half-elven"
column3: p. 1034 (The Lord of the Rings (50th Anniversary Edition))
